tree.name: Damian Lillard
tree.note: Signed 3-year deal as free agent after being waived by Milwaukee Bucks. Originally drafted #6 by Portland in 2012, traded to Milwaukee in September 2023, returned as free agent in July 2025. Tore Achilles in 2025 playoffs, expected to miss 2025-26 season. 3yr/$42M (~$14M/yr)
